segmentosSRT.text: They're too tired. Been at it all night.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_31

segmentosSRT.text:
but you've nothing left.
What would you wager?
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_31

segmentosSRT.text: If you're unhappy, talk to Mr. Xie.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_31

segmentosSRT.text: Not that we'd accept it as ante.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_31

segmentosSRT.text: It's valuable. Don't scratch it. Take it slowly.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_31

segmentosSRT.text: This old home of yours is great.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_31

segmentosSRT.text: Warm in winter, cool in summer.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_31

segmentosSRT.text: The wounded who froze to death.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_31

segmentosSRT.text: Put it on. We must survive.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_31

segmentosSRT.text:
He backed up,
and his jeep knocked the wall down.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_31

segmentosSRT.text: Youqing was sleeping on the other side.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_31

segmentosSRT.text: The District Chief was hurt, too.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_31

segmentosSRT.text: He hadn't slept for three days.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_31

segmentosSRT.text:
We have to try and bear it,
even in the worst of times.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_31

segmentosSRT.text: Thanks, we'll go to the factory bathhouse.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_31

segmentosSRT.text: You've gone to so much trouble.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_31

segmentosSRT.text: What do you think about Fengxia and me?
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_31

segmentosSRT.text: The Red Guards are in control!
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_31

segmentosSRT.text: Dad! Mom! Has she given birth?
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_31
